name: Sean McGrath
content: Dr Sean McGrath | Goldsmiths, University of London Main menu Staff & students In this section Sean’s research explores the intersection between technology and people, with a particular focus on audio. Staff details Position Lecturer Department Computing Email s.mcgrath (@gold.ac.uk) Twitter seanige Sean’s research explores the intersection between technology and people, with a particular focus on audio. He has worked for large and small technology organisations, and worked as a professional musician. Qualifications PhD, Brunel University BSc 1st Class Hons, Goldsmiths, University of London Teaching Fundamentals of Computer Science Agile Software Projects Data Programming Web Development User Experience Design Multimedia Computing Final Year Project Supervision PhD Supervision Research Interests Audio, Music Computing, HCI, UX, UCD, Web Technologies.
